sourcesContent:
import React, { useState, useEffect } from 'react'; import { FontAwesomeIcon } from "@fortawesome/react-fontawesome"; import { faAngleLeft, faEnvelope, faUnlockAlt, faUser } from "@fortawesome/free-solid-svg-icons"; import { faFacebookF, faGithub, faTwitter, faBootstrap } from "@fortawesome/free-brands-svg-icons"; import { Col, Row, Form, Card, Button, FormCheck, Container, InputGroup, Toast } from '@themesberg/react-bootstrap'; import { Link, useParams } from 'react-router-dom'; import { Routes } from "../../routes"; import BgImage from "../../assets/img/illustrations/signin.svg"; import setAuthToken from '../validation/authAuthToken'; const axios = require('axios').default; export default () => { let { ref_link } = useParams() let initialState = { full_name: "", email: "", password: "", confirm_password: "", country_code: "44", country: "", phone_number: "", privacy_status: "", ref_id: ref_link, } const [form, setForm] = useState(initialState) const [showDefault, setShowDefault] = useState(true); const toggleDefaultToast = () => setShowDefault(!showDefault); const [value, setValue] = useState(""); const [message, setMessage] = useState(""); const [errorClass, setErrorClass] = useState("text-danger"); // useEffect(() => { // console.log(form) // }, [form]) let formHandler = async (e) => { let { name, value, checked } = e.target if (checked == true && name == "privacy_status") { setForm({ ...form, [name]: 1 }) } else if (checked == false && name == "privacy_status") { setForm({ ...form, [name]: 0 }) } else { setForm({ ...form, [name]: value }) } } const handleSignUp = (e) => { e.preventDefault(); if (form.password != form.confirm_password) { setMessage("Passwords do not match") setTimeout(() => { setMessage("") }, 5000); } else { const user = { full_name: form.full_name, email: form.email, password: form.password, country_code: form.country_code, country: form.country, phone_number: form.phone_number, privacy_status: form.privacy_status, ref_id: form.ref_id, } axios({ method: 'post', url: `${process.env.REACT_APP_SERVER_URL}/api/register`, data: user, headers: { 'Content-Type': 'application/json', } }) .then(function (response) { console.log(response.data); let res = response.data if (res.status === true && res.code === 200) { setMessage(res.message) let token = res.data.token setErrorClass('text-white bg-success rounded-1 my-2 px-2') // localStorage.setItem("token", token); // setAuthToken(token); // window.location.href = '/dashboard/overview' } else if (res.status === false && res.code === 422) { setErrorClass('text-white bg-danger rounded-1 my-2 px-2') if (res.errors.full_name) { setMessage(res.errors.full_name[0]) } else if (res.errors.email) { setMessage(res.errors.email[0]) } else if (res.errors.password) { setMessage(res.errors.password[0]) } else if (res.errors.phone_number) { setMessage(res.errors.phone_number[0]) } else if (res.errors.country) { setMessage(res.errors.country[0]) } else if (res.errors.privacy_status) { setMessage(res.errors.privacy_status[0]) } else if (res.errors.country_code) { setMessage(res.errors.country_code[0]) } } else { setMessage("An Error Occured") } }) .catch(function (error) { console.log(error); setMessage("An Error Occured") setErrorClass("text-center d-flex justify-content-center badge badge-danger") }); } } return (

Create an account

Full Name Email Select Country Mobile Number Password Confirm Password Referral I accept the Terms & Conditions of Vanguard Investments Ltd. (FCA Regulated) and Risk Disclosure I acknowledge that my information will be used in accordance with the Privacy Policy and Cookie Policy
{message}
Already have an account? {` Login here `}
); };
